keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight against the privatising the NHS and to protect local services.
I am against the increasing numbers of pupils per class. Labour will protect education funding.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: ENERGY BILLS - A CAP ON INCREASES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will impose a ceiling on bills until January 2017.
We desperately need new affordable housing both locally and nationally.
Labour will provide 25 hours free childcare for three and four year olds and promote access to care from 8 am to 6 pm for primary school children.

issues.education: I am against the increasing numbers of pupils per class. Labour will protect education funding.
issues.health: I will fight against the privatising the NHS and to protect local services.

housing.content: We desperately need new affordable housing both locally and nationally.
